alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 09 at 5:47AM MST until March 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 22 inches possible, with locally higher amounts in the Upper Cottonwoods, Provo area mountains and western Uintas. Winds could gust as high as 70 mph, locally stronger on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Western Uinta Mountains and Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs. * WHEN...From this evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Mountains
